entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Risk of hail early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023
